deals.websiteTitle: Tickets to Paul McCartney in London
deals.description:
Prices include all fees and charges

Brace yourself for one of the biggest artists in the world, as Paul McCartney brings his incredible â€˜Out Thereâ€™ tour to Britain. The legendary Beatle will be performing many of his iconic smash hits from his solo, Wings and Beatles back catalogue, including the likes of â€˜Hey Judeâ€™, â€˜Yesterdayâ€™, â€˜Let It Beâ€™, â€˜Let Me Roll Itâ€™ and â€˜Maybe Iâ€™m Amazedâ€™. This is the first show Paul McCartney has performed in London for three years, bringing home the show thatâ€™s been seen by nearly 2 million people across 12 countries. Whether youâ€™re a fan of the Beatles, Wings or his solo work, make sure you donâ€™t miss this special career-spanning show, and get your tickets for the London O2 concert here.

deals.finePrint:
• Tickets will be sent out by post to the billing address registered with Amazon
  • All tickets purchased up to and including 13th May 2015 will be sent via post. Any tickets purchased after this date will be available for collection at the venue box office on the day, valid ID will be required for collecting the tickets at the venue
  • Your ticket(s) to Paul McCartney are not refundable
  • Customers will not be allowed admission to this event without a valid ticket
  • Ticket price includes a venue facility fee of Â£1.50. Ticket price includes all fees
  • Restrictions: These ticket/tickets are valid only for the purchased event. All children must have a ticket. Children aged 14 and under need to be accompanied by an adult aged 18 and over. No smoking in the entire O2 complex
  • Availability: Tickets valid for performances at the O2 Arena, London on Sunday 24th May 2015 at 6.30pm
  • Purchase Limit: Maximum six tickets per purchaser
  • Assistance: To find out about accessibility for visitors with special requirements please call the venue on 020 8463 2000
  • Questions: about bookings? please contact the ticket provider directly on 0203 137 7420 or email customerservices@ingresso.co.uk

deals.websiteTitle: Two-Course Greek Meal with a Glass of Wine for Two or Four People
deals.description:
Sample the flavours of the Mediterranean with a two-course Greek dining experience from Manos. This popular Greek eatery offers an extensive menu packed with some of the finest Greek dishes around, from traditional moussaka to other specialist delicacies such as papoutsakia, kimadopitta or keftedes fournou. Enjoy a starter and main with a friend or group, before finishing your flavorsome evening with a crisp glass of red wine.

  • Â£21 (regular price Â£31) for a two-course meal with a glass of wine for two people
  • Â£40 (regular price Â£62) for a two-course meal with a glass of wine for four people
  • Your meal will include a main, a starter and a glass of house red or white wine
  • Browse a tempting menu of Greek dishes that includes beef stifado, chicken souvlaki and spetsofai
  • Dine seven days a week, from 12pm
deals.finePrint:
• Voucher valid for a starter and a main with a glass of house red or white wine each for two or four people, depending on option purchased
  • Buy as many as you like; send as many as you like as gifts
  • Reservations are required and are subject to availability
  • The merchant requires a notice period of 24 hours for cancellations or rescheduling, or your voucher will be considered used
  • Voucher valid Monday to Saturday from 12pm to 9pm and Sundays from 12pm to 7.30pm
  • Customers must be 18 or older with valid ID
  • Click here to view the menu
  • Wine may be exchanged for a bottle of beer upon request
  • Mezze Plater, Moussaka, Fournou and Sifado dishes are available at a Â£2.50 surcharge, payable directly to the merchant
  • Any additional items ordered will be charged at their regular menu price
  • Menu items subject to change based on seasonal availability or market change
  • Any allergies or special dietary requirements must be highlighted to the server on arrival
  • The image shown for this deal is for demonstration purposes only and not an actual representation of the experience on offer at Manos
  • Entire redeemable value of the voucher must be used in a single visit
  • Available for use immediately after purchase
  • The total value of your voucher is valid until 23:59 on 29th November 2015. Learn More

deals.description:
Canâ€™t think of a gift that will send that certain someone over the moon? How about naming a star in their honour with Star Register. This bright idea allows you to pick a name and constellation, and your star will be logged forever in the Official Star Registry. Youâ€™ll receive a digital certificate, photo book and star kit so that your special someone can learn about their interstellar present. One of the most thoughtful gifts for any occasion, why not match the constellation you choose to an astrological date or a loved oneâ€™s horoscope?

  • Â£10 (regular price Â£19.99) for a Name A Star pack
  • Name a star in the Official Star Register
  • Receive a personalised digital certificate, Star Map, limited offer photo book and â€˜Celestiaâ€™ software
  • Only choose from extra bright constellation and Zodiac stars
  • Youâ€™ll receive your digital gift pack in less than 24 hours
deals.finePrint:
• Your voucher will be redeemed online, you will be provided with instructions on how to order your â€˜Name a Starâ€™ package after purchase
  • Once you have successfully redeemed your voucher your pack will be emailed to you within 24 hours
  • Buy as many as you like; send as many as you like as gifts
  • Voucher valid for a 'Name A Star' package
  • One voucher to be used per order
  • Star names are not recognised by the International Astronomical Union
  • For any enquiries please contact Star Register at orders@starregister.org
  • To view Star Register's frequently asked questions please click here

options.title: Name A Star Package

deals.description:
Take those first steps towards becoming a professional makeup designer with a course from Online School of Beauty. Specifically designed for students who are interested in learning the foundations of makeup artistry, the course features five beautifying topics thatâ€™ll turn you into a makeup pro in no time, setting you up to go down such exciting routes as fashion, advertising, TV/film and celebrity makeup. Benefit from full tutor support and set out on an exciting career with this online course.

  • Â£25 (regular price Â£199) for an online certificate in beginnerâ€™s makeup
  • The course consists of five lessons, covering topics such as eyebrow shaping, lip liners and contouring
  • The course includes video tutorials, an interactive forum and graded assignments
  • The course is suitable for all skill levels
  • You will have 12 months to complete your course
deals.finePrint:
Redemption method: You are purchasing a voucher that will be redeemed online after purchase. You will be provided with instructions on how to register for your course. Voucher available for use immediately after purchase

Redemption period: You will have 12 months from the date of redemption to complete the course
Course access: Course log-in details and instructions will be emailed to you immediately after redemption
Purchase limit: Buy as many as you like, send as many as you like as gifts
Technical restriction: All browsers are supported
Questions: For any enquiries email info@onlineschoolofbeauty.com
Validity period: The total value of the voucher is valid until 23:59, 59 days from the purchase date of this voucher and will expire immediately after such date. Learn More

options.title: Online Certificate in Beginners Makeup

deals.description:
Take your singing performances out of the shower and onto the stage with an online vocal coaching course from Rock Star Academy. Taught by professional vocal coach John Smith, the course takes you through the basics of voice control and vocal health, before going onto more advanced topics like mic control and stage presence. The lessons are comprised of a series of compelling videos and written content, and with your tutor encouraging you to choose the musical styles that appeal to you, this promises to be a fun course no matter what your musical taste.

  • Â£12 (regular price Â£49) for an online vocal coaching course
  • The course is broken into three sections, covering such topics as vocal health, mental attitude and mic control
  • Benefit from the expertise of professional vocal coach John Scott
  • You will have 12 months to complete the course
deals.finePrint:
• Redemption method: You are purchasing a voucher that will be redeemed online after purchase. You will be provided with instructions on how to register for your course. Voucher available for use immediately after purchase
  • Redemption period: You will have 12 months from the date of redemption to complete the course
  • Course access: You will be able to log in to your course within 48 hours of redemption
  • Purchase limit: Buy as many as you like, send as many as you like as gifts
  • Technical restriction: All browsers are supported
  • Questions: For any enquiries call 01455 613 290 or email members@rockstaracademy.net
  • Validity period: The total value of the voucher is valid until 23:59, 59 days from the purchase date of this voucher and will expire immediately after such date. Learn More
